1484870.name: RUNE II: Wolf Armor + Weapon Set
1484870.description:
The Wolf Armor + Weapon Set is available as an ingame recipe.

Fenrir was a monstrous beast born of the trickster god Loki and a giantess named Angrboða, who caused terror throughout Midgard. It was foretold that he would be the cause of Odin’s demise during Ragnarok, but that prophecy did not come to be. Fenrir was smited by Odin’s son Víðarr before he had the chance to swallow Odin whole.

In honor of Víðarr’s valiant act, weapons and gear were forged by the blacksmith’s of Midgard and are bestowed upon the most worthy of warriors. Don a Wolf Hood as you wield a mighty Iron Wolf Shield and Mace, showing your enemies that you are not a Viking to be trifled with.
1484870.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
